thread.title: Customer Mike Vaillancourt
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer Mike Vaillancourt

author: Customer Mike Vaillancourt
title: Customer Mike Vaillancourt
text: Hade new tires installed on 14 RDX left with new tires and a vibrating went back to town fair tire a tec said right front is missing balance weight with over an hour left in the day they wood not take care of it and said u will have to come back another day being the owner of mutable cars having spent 1/600.00 on tires in a three month span I don't think I will do any business with them again seankonk
